articles.author: Ben Leonard
articles.title: Biden issues proclamation on Tulsa race massacre - POLITICO
articles.description: “I call on the American people to … recommit to the work of rooting out systemic racism across our country,” the president said.
articles.content: No Black people who survived the massacre or their relatives have been given compensation in return. Insurance companies declined most Black victims claims, which were worth more than $27 million in … [+2354 chars]

articles.title: Brazil to host 2021 Copa America after scheduling chaos sees event pulled from Colombia and Argentina - Goal India
articles.description: The U.S. men's national team faced their toughest test in a while against Switzerland and came up short on Sunday - but the experience could still prove beneficial ahead of their Nations League semi-final

articles.title: Paul Rucker's 'Black Wall Streets' Marks 100 Years Since The Tulsa Race Massacre - NPR
articles.description: Paul Rucker's multimedia work tackles mass incarceration, lynching, police brutality and the ways America has been shaped by slavery. His latest marks the 100th anniversary of the Tulsa Race Massacre.
articles.content: Artist Paul Rucker is creating a new multimedia work to commemorate the 100th anniversary of the Tulsa Race Massacre. That's when a thriving African American community was destroyed in a horrific act… [+7969 chars]

articles.title: Memorial for racist Tulsa massacre cancelled over cash demands - The Times
articles.description: An event to mark the centenary of one of the worst race massacres has been cancelled in a dispute over payments to descendants of three hundred black Americans and three living survivors.White mobs

articles.title: Cancer symptoms: Six warning signs on your feet that may indicate a growing skin tumour - Express
articles.description: SKIN cancer on the feet 'often spreads before it's noticed', warned the American Academy of Dermatology Association (AAD). This typically tends to be the most serious type of skin cancer too, known as melanoma.
